summary.span: 命名空间包含一些类型，这些类型在使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目中扩展和支持 Microsoft Office Word 对象模型。

span.span: The namespace contains types that extend and support the Microsoft Office Word object model in projects created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

summary.span: 有关这些项目的详细信息，请参阅 [Office 项目模板概述](/visualstudio/vsto/office-project-templates-overview.md)。

span.span: For more information about these projects, see [Office Project Templates Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/office-project-templates-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间包括以下主要类型：The namespace includes the following main types: - 类。The class. 这是类的基类`ThisDocument`Word 的文档级项目中的类。This is the base class for the `ThisDocument` class in document-level projects for Word. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Programming Document-level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md). - 接口。The interface. 此接口表示可以在 Word 在运行时在应用程序级外接程序中创建一个扩展的文档。This interface represents an extended document that you can create at run time in application-level add-ins for Word. 有关更多信息，请参见 [在运行时在 VSTO 外接程序中扩展 Word 文档和 Excel 工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). - 主机控件，包括和内容控件，如和。Host controls, including and content controls such as and . 有关主机控件的信息，请参阅[主机项和主机控件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md)并[Word 主机控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a3a2376c-e0d1-4357-95e1-aa6b7d125738)。For information about host controls, see [Host Items and Host Controls Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md) and [Word Host Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a3a2376c-e0d1-4357-95e1-aa6b7d125738). - 提供在 Word 解决方案中，包括智能标记功能的类型和。Types that provide smart tag functionality in Word solutions, including and . - 各种帮助程序类型，如事件自变量和委托。Various helper types, such as event arguments and delegates.
